text: Johan Olof Wallin, born 15 October 1779 in Yttre Skomsarby, Sweden, dead 30 June 1839 in Uppsala, Sweden was a Swedish Lutheran clergyman. He was the Church of Sweden Archbishop of Uppsala between 1837 and 1839. He also wrote many Christian songs/hymns. == References == ==Other websites== * Svenskt Biografiskt Handlexikon (1906), in Swedish * Nordiskt familjelexikon article Wallin, Johan Olof. In Swedish. title: Johan Olof Wallin
